title: Internship Wine and Viticulture
description: One or two quarters spent with an approved wine industry employer engaged in wine production or related agribusiness and viticulture activities. Applying and developing production and managerial skills and abilities. One unit of credit may be allowed for each full week of completed and reported internship. Total Major credit limited to 6 units. Total credit limited to 12 units. Credit/No Credit grading only.
prerequisites: WVIT 202, WVIT/FRSC 231 or WVIT 311; junior standing; and consent of internship instructor
